section.title: incidents creating new priorities for Incident Priority
section.para: To create a new Incident Priority, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:
When creating a new Incident Priority, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter a name to define the Priority (e.g., High, Medium, Low, etc.).
Specify the order in which the Priority should appear when using the drop-down list on the Incident screen.
Enter a brief description of the Incident Priority.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without creating an Incident Priority, returning you to the previous screen.
Creates the Incident Priority and adds it to the master list of Incident Priorities.
